page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: OLDER HOUSING Most housing in the village is pre first world war.Most are small cottages.Some have been extended. The main materials used are brick and tiles. Some extensions have been built with hand-made bricks so as to fit in with the character of the village. MODERN DEVELOPMENTS These have taken place on Main Street, Elmfield Drive and St.Quintins Park. Elmfield Drive is a mixture of privately owned semi-detatched and detatched houses and borders the golf course. St.Quintins Park contains bungalows and houses owned by the Local Authority and some privately owned.
